trans-unit.source: Specifies a palette when setting a Palette property.
trans-unit.target: Especifica uma paleta ao configurar uma propriedade Palette.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartColorPalette> enumeration represents the palettes to be used for the root <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> object and any <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Series> objects.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartColorPalette> enumeração representa as paletas a ser usado para a raiz <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> objeto e qualquer <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Series> objetos.

trans-unit.source: If no colors are assigned to data points and their associated series, the default colors will be assigned to the data.
trans-unit.target: Se nenhum cores são atribuídas a pontos de dados e sua série associada, as cores padrão serão atribuídas aos dados.

trans-unit.source: For example:
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo:

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.Palette%2A> is set to None, then the default palette is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.PaletteCustomColors%2A> or BrightPastel.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.Palette%2A> está definida como None, a paleta padrão será definido como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.PaletteCustomColors%2A> ou BrightPastel.

trans-unit.source: If.<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Series.Palette%2A>
trans-unit.target: Se.<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Series.Palette%2A>

trans-unit.source: is set to None, then the default palette for the chart is used (<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.Palette%2A>).
trans-unit.target: é definida como None, a paleta padrão para o gráfico será usada (<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.Palette%2A>).

trans-unit.source: Palette utilizes blues and purples.
trans-unit.target: A paleta utiliza azuis e roxos.

trans-unit.source: Palette utilizes bright colors.
trans-unit.target: A paleta utiliza cores vivas.

trans-unit.source: Palette utilizes bright pastel colors.
trans-unit.target: A paleta utiliza cores pastel vivas.

trans-unit.source: Palette utilizes shades of brown.
trans-unit.target: A paleta utiliza tons de marrom.

trans-unit.source: Palette utilizes earth tone colors such as green and brown.
trans-unit.target: A paleta utiliza cores de tom de terra, como verde e marrom.

trans-unit.source: Palette utilizes Excel-style colors.
trans-unit.target: A paleta utiliza as cores do estilo do Excel.

trans-unit.source: Palette utilizes red, orange and yellow colors.
trans-unit.target: A paleta utiliza as cores vermelha, laranja e amarela.

trans-unit.source: Palette utilizes grayscale colors, that is, shades of black and white.
trans-unit.target: A paleta utiliza cores da escala de cinza, ou seja, tons de preto e branco.

trans-unit.source: Palette utilizes <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LightStyle" /> style colors; very light colors..
trans-unit.target: A paleta utiliza cores do estilo <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.LightStyle" />, cores muito claras.

trans-unit.source: No palette is used.
trans-unit.target: Nenhuma paleta é usada.

trans-unit.source: Palette utilizes pastel colors.
trans-unit.target: A paleta utiliza cores pastel.

trans-unit.source: Palette utilizes colors that range from green to blue.
trans-unit.target: A paleta utiliza cores que vão do verde ao azul.

trans-unit.source: Palette utilizes semi-transparent colors.
trans-unit.target: A paleta utiliza cores semitransparentes.
